item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, January 3, 2025 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. French red wine in sharp decline as tastes change among young drinkers
2. [Opinion] Inequality hasn’t risen. Here’s why it feels like it has
3. Meta global affairs chief Clegg to be replaced by Republican Kaplan
4. UK heading for tax rises despite return to growth, economists say
5. Real Madrid’s concert dreams put on hold by ‘noisy neighbour’ complaints
